key.name: profile-app
key.description: The application name for which the current effect settings should be used.

key.name: profile-animation-type
key.description: The animation types for which the current effect settings should be used.

key.name: profile-window-type
key.description: The window types for which the current effect settings should be used.

key.name: profile-color-scheme
key.description: The desktop color schemes for which the current effect settings should be used.

key.name: profile-power-mode
key.description: The power mode for which the current effect settings should be used.

key.name: profile-power-profile
key.description: The power profiles in which the current effect settings should be used.

key.name: profile-high-priority
key.description: Use this profile even if there are better matching profiles.

key.name: apparition-enable-effect
key.description: Use the apparition effect.

key.name: apparition-animation-time
key.description: The time the apparition effect takes.

key.name: apparition-randomness
key.description: The amount of randomness of the apparition effect.

key.name: apparition-twirl-intensity
key.description: The amount of twirling of the apparition effect.

key.name: apparition-shake-intensity
key.description: The amount of shaking of the apparition effect.

key.name: apparition-suction-intensity
key.description: The amount of suction of the apparition effect.

key.name: pixelate-enable-effect
key.description: Use the Pixelate effect.

key.name: pixelate-animation-time
key.description: The time the Pixelate effect takes.

key.name: pixelate-noise
key.description: The noise of the effect.

key.name: pixelate-pixel-size
key.description: The size of the maximum pixelation.

key.name: pixel-wipe-enable-effect
key.description: Use the Pixel Wipe effect.

key.name: pixel-wipe-animation-time
key.description: The time the Pixel Wipe effect takes.

key.name: pixel-wipe-pixel-size
key.description: The size of the maximum pixelation.

key.name: pixel-wheel-enable-effect
key.description: Use the Pixel Wheel effect.

key.name: pixel-wheel-animation-time
key.description: The time the Pixel Wheel effect takes.

key.name: pixel-wheel-spoke-count
key.description: The number of sections in the wheel.

key.name: pixel-wheel-pixel-size
key.description: The size of the maximum pixelation.

key.name: doom-enable-effect
key.description: Use the Doom effect.

key.name: doom-animation-time
key.description: The time the Doom effect takes.

key.name: doom-horizontal-scale
key.description: The X scale of the effect.

key.name: doom-vertical-scale
key.description: The Y scale of the effect.

key.name: doom-pixel-size
key.description: The size of the maximum pixelation.

key.name: fire-enable-effect
key.description: Use the fire effect.

key.name: fire-animation-time
key.description: The time the fire effect takes.

key.name: fire-movement-speed
key.description: The speed at which the fire moves.

key.name: fire-scale
key.description: The size of the fire.

key.name: fire-3d-noise
key.description: Use a 3D noise for the fire.

key.name: fire-color-1
key.description: The first color of the fire gradient.

key.name: fire-color-2
key.description: The second color of the fire gradient.

key.name: fire-color-3
key.description: The third color of the fire gradient.

key.name: fire-color-4
key.description: The fourth color of the fire gradient.

key.name: fire-color-5
key.description: The fifth color of the fire gradient.

key.name: glide-enable-effect
key.description: Use the glide effect.

key.name: glide-animation-time
key.description: The time the glide effect takes.

key.name: glide-scale
key.description: The scale of the window.

key.name: glide-squish
key.description: The amount of squishing.

key.name: glide-tilt
key.description: The amount of tilting.

key.name: glide-shift
key.description: The amount of shifting.

key.name: matrix-enable-effect
key.description: Use the matrix effect.

key.name: matrix-animation-time
key.description: The time the matrix effect takes.

key.name: matrix-scale
key.description: The size of the matrix letters.

key.name: matrix-randomness
key.description: The randomness of the matrix effect.

key.name: matrix-tip-color
key.description: The color of the matrix trail tips.

key.name: matrix-trail-color
key.description: The color matrix trails.

key.name: matrix-overshoot
key.description: The vertical overshooting of the matrix effect.

key.name: tv-enable-effect
key.description: Use the tv effect.

key.name: tv-animation-time
key.description: The time the tv effect takes.

key.name: tv-effect-color
key.description: The color of the TV effect.

key.description: Use the paint-brush effect.

key.name: paint-brush-animation-time
key.description: The time the paint-brush effect takes.

key.name: paint-brush-size
key.description: Affects the number of paint strokes.

key.name: trex-scratch-color
key.description: The color of the claw scratches.

key.description: Size of the claw scratches.

key.name: trex-scratch-warp
key.description: Intensity of the claw scratch warp effect.

key.name: trex-scratch-count
key.description: Number of claw scratches drawn on top of each other.
